title: Application of Pascal's Law. Part 1. The Hydraulic jack
creator_credit: United States. Navy. Bureau of Aeronautics
brief_description: The film reviews Pascal’s Law, and studies the input and output pistons and the system in actual motion. Demonstrates how work is done by means of a hydraulic system and how the amount of work performed is measured.
title_for_label: Application of Pascal’s Law. Part 1. The Hydraulic jack
